english.segment1: Are you who you say you are
english.segment2: Will your life shine in the dark
english.segment3: Are you standing on the truth
english.segment8: Just so I make myself clear
english.segment9: This aint no game were playing here
english.segment10: There is no fence to hold you up
english.segment11: So decide which side to give up
english.segment16: Youre either hot or youre cold
english.segment18: Will you stay or will you run
english.segment20: Youre either in or youre out
english.segment22: When He calls for His own
